summary: ARRIVING HOME FROM DINNER, FOUND REAR GLASS OF MY 1999 MERCURY SABLE WAGON HAD EXPLODED.  THERE WAS GLASS ALL OVER MY DRIVE WAY.  THE GLASS WAS FOUND UP TO 5 FEET FROM THE VEHICLE.  POLICE INVESTIGATED AND DETERMINED THAT THE REAR GLASS PANEL IN FACT EXPLODED FROM THE INSIDE OF THE VEHICLE OUTWARD, PROBABLY DUE TO A CHANGE IN TEMPERATURE.*JB
